title: Participants in tackle football in the U.S. from 2006 to 2018
summary: The chart at hand is a line chart where the x axis denotes Year and a y axis denotes Number of participants in millions. In total the number of data points it has is 13.
In general Number of participants in millions has fallen over the Year.
The most drastic decrease took place within the Year 2010 and 2011.
Maximum Number of participants in millions, about 8.4 was reported at Year 2006
The lowest Number of participants in millions, of value 5.16 was reported at Year 2018
